system.cardDesc: Configure basic platform info and runtime policies.
system.systemNameDesc: Shown in the top bar and sidebar as the product name.
system.autoStartDesc: Start core containers when app launches.

agent.cardDesc: Configure the local Browser Agent HTTP service used by n8n and others. It only listens on 127.0.0.1. For production, set a strong token.

enable.label: Enable Browser Agent
enable.desc: When enabled, start a local Browser Agent HTTP service on 127.0.0.1.

port.label: Service port
port.desc: Local port for Browser Agent HTTP service. Only 1024-65535 are allowed.

example.label: Example endpoint
example.desc: Use this as a reference URL in n8n HTTP nodes, etc.

token.label: Access token
token.desc: Optional. If set, all HTTP requests must send X-Browser-Agent-Token or Authorization: Bearer <token>. Leave empty to disable auth.
token.placeholder: It is recommended to use a sufficiently random string, e.g. a 32–64 character token.

dataRoot.label: Data/log directory (optional)
dataRoot.desc: Directory for Browser Agent text logs, NDJSON metadata, screenshots and downloaded files. Leave empty to use the default data directory.

agent.footerTip: After changing the port, it is recommended to restart the app so Browser Agent listens on the new port.

network.cardDesc: Configure image mirrors, proxy and network access policy.

proxyMode.label: Proxy mode
proxyMode.desc: Use proxy to access external services in restricted networks.

proxyHost.label: Proxy host
proxyHost.desc: Only effective when manual proxy is selected.

test.success: Connection test succeeded. Docker can pull images via current proxy.
test.fail: Connection test failed. Please check Docker and proxy configuration.

n8n.title: n8n settings
n8n.cardDesc: Configure n8n ports, database and environment variables.
n8n.toastDisableRunningWarn: n8n is currently running and cannot be disabled. Please stop the service on the Dashboard first.
n8n.toastDisableStatusError: Failed to check n8n runtime status. Disabling is temporarily unavailable.
n8n.toastSecretNotGenerated: Secrets are not generated yet. Please start n8n first.
n8n.toastApplyRestartFail: Failed to apply settings and restart n8n. Please try again.
n8n.toastApplyRestartSuccess: n8n settings applied and service restarted.
n8n.backupFailed: Failed to back up n8n data. Please try again.
n8n.backupCompletedWithPath: n8n data has been backed up to: {{path}}
n8n.restoreConfirm: This will overwrite all current n8n data with the selected backup and may be irreversible. Continue?
n8n.restoreFailed: Failed to restore n8n data. Please try again.

fields.enabledDesc: When disabled, the n8n module will not appear in the console.
fields.portDesc: Port on the host mapped from the n8n container.
fields.consoleDesc: Derived from localhost and port, for reference only.
fields.webhookDesc: Reference URL when n8n generates webhooks.
fields.dbModeDesc: Choose between managed Postgres or external PostgreSQL.
fields.extUserDesc: User to connect to the external database.
fields.envDesc: One per line in KEY=VALUE format (excluding fields configured above).
fields.secretsDesc: Generated on first n8n start to encrypt credentials etc. Not editable here.
fields.secretNotGenerated: Not generated yet (will be created when n8n starts).
fields.backupDesc: Back up the n8n module database or restore from a backup (understand the risk before proceeding).

dify.title: Dify settings
dify.cardDesc: Configure Dify ports and environment variables (reuses existing DB and Redis instances).
dify.toastDisableRunningWarn: Dify is currently running and cannot be disabled. Please stop the service on the Dashboard first.
dify.toastDisableStatusError: Failed to check Dify runtime status. Disabling is temporarily unavailable.
dify.toastApplyRestartFail: Failed to apply settings and restart Dify. Please try again.
dify.toastApplyRestartSuccess: Dify settings applied and service restarted.

fields.enabledDesc: When disabled, the Dify module will not appear in the console.
fields.portDesc: Port on the host mapped from the Dify Web container.
fields.consoleDesc: Derived from localhost and port, for reference only.
fields.envDesc: One per line in KEY=VALUE format (excluding DB/Redis connection fields).

oneapi.title: OneAPI settings
oneapi.cardDesc: Configure OneAPI ports, logging and database options.
oneapi.toastDisableRunningWarn: OneAPI is currently running and cannot be disabled. Please stop the service on the Dashboard first.
oneapi.toastDisableStatusError: Failed to check OneAPI runtime status. Disabling is temporarily unavailable.
oneapi.toastSecretNotGenerated: Secrets are not generated yet. Please start OneAPI first.
oneapi.toastApplyRestartFail: Failed to apply settings and restart OneAPI. Please try again.
oneapi.toastApplyRestartSuccess: OneAPI settings applied and service restarted.
oneapi.backupFailed: Failed to back up OneAPI data. Please try again.
oneapi.backupCompletedWithPath: OneAPI data has been backed up to: {{path}}
oneapi.restoreConfirm: This will overwrite all current OneAPI data with the selected backup and may be irreversible. Continue?
oneapi.restoreFailed: Failed to restore OneAPI data. Please try again.

fields.enabledDesc: When disabled, the OneAPI module will not appear in the console.
fields.portDesc: Port on the host mapped from the OneAPI container.
fields.apiDesc: Derived from localhost and port, for reference only.
fields.logFieldDesc: Control whether to enable OneAPI debug logs (DEBUG / DEBUG_SQL).
fields.dbModeDesc: Choose between managed MySQL + Redis or external MySQL / Redis.
fields.envDesc: One per line in KEY=VALUE format (excluding fields configured above).
fields.secretsDesc: Generated on first OneAPI start for session encryption etc. Not editable here.
fields.secretNotGenerated: Not generated yet (will be created when OneAPI starts).
fields.backupDesc: Back up the OneAPI module database or restore from a backup (understand the risk before proceeding).

ragflow.title: RagFlow settings
ragflow.cardDesc: Configure RagFlow ports, database/storage and environment variables.
ragflow.toastDisableRunningWarn: RagFlow is currently running and cannot be disabled. Please stop the service on the Dashboard first.
ragflow.toastDisableStatusError: Failed to check RagFlow runtime status. Disabling is temporarily unavailable.
ragflow.toastApplyRestartFail: Failed to apply settings and restart RagFlow. Please try again.
ragflow.toastApplyRestartSuccess: RagFlow settings applied and service restarted.

fields.enabledDesc: When disabled, the RagFlow module will not appear in the console.
fields.portDesc: Port on the host mapped from the RagFlow HTTP service (container listens on 80, proxied by nginx to 9380).
fields.consoleDesc: Derived from localhost and port, for reference only.
fields.modelCacheDesc: Leave empty to use the default cache path inside the container. If set, this directory will be mounted to /root/.ragflow to store HuggingFace and other model caches.
fields.connectionsDesc: By default the built-in MySQL / Redis / MinIO are reused. Usually you do not need to change this. To customize, override related env variables below.
fields.connectionsMysql: MySQL: MYSQL_DBNAME / MYSQL_USER / MYSQL_PASSWORD / MYSQL_HOST / MYSQL_PORT
fields.logDesc: Control RagFlow internal logging via LOG_LEVELS and DEBUG.
fields.logAdvancedTip: Advanced: set LOG_LEVELS in env (e.g. root=INFO,peewee=WARNING).
fields.envDesc: One per line in KEY=VALUE format (excluding reserved fields listed above).

generic.cardDesc: Configure module ports, database and environment variables.

fields.enabledDesc: When disabled, this module will not appear in the console.
fields.portDesc: Port on the host mapped from the container.
fields.dbUrlDesc: Optional. Leave empty to use the module's built-in storage or default config.
fields.envDesc: One per line in KEY=VALUE format.

debug.clearStorageDesc: Delete all localStorage entries used by this app (language, UI state, etc.) to troubleshoot issues. The app will reload afterwards.
debug.clearStorageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all localStorage data for this app? This will reset language and other preferences.
debug.clearStorageFail: Failed to clear localStorage. Please try again.

debugPage.cardDesc: Advanced options for troubleshooting and development.

showTools.label: Show debug tools
showTools.desc: Display additional debug entry points in the UI.

verboseLogging.label: Verbose logging
verboseLogging.desc: Enable to output more debug logs.

showSystemName.label: Show system-name setting
showSystemName.desc: When off, hide the "Product name" field in system settings.

browserViewIdleMinutes.label: Module BrowserView idle destroy time (minutes)
browserViewIdleMinutes.desc: Destroy module BrowserViews after being idle in the background for this duration to free memory.

debugActions.fail: Failed to run debug action, check Docker.

dangerDialog.title: Confirm dangerous operation?
dangerDialog.description: You are about to perform "{{action}}". This may remove containers or volumes. Make sure important data is backed up.
